thread.title: PCM cruises to fifth straight victory, rout Trojans
thread.title_full: PCM cruises to fifth straight victory, rout Trojans

title: PCM cruises to fifth straight victory, rout Trojans
text:
PCM cruises to fifth straight victory, rout Trojans Published: Monday, Oct. 5, 2015 11:40 a.m. CDT • Updated: Monday, Oct. 5, 2015 12:20 p.m. CDT Caption (Mike Mendenhall/Prairie City News) Prairie City-Monroe senior Tyler Dredge, left, runs by West Marshall sophomore Christian Carbajal during the Mustangs’ 38-0 win on Friday night in Monroe. It was PCM’s fifth straight win. By Troy Hyde Newton Daily News 
MONROE — Prairie City-Monroe’s Mustangs recorded their fifth straight win and improved to 5-1 on the season following a 38-0 non-district, homecoming triumph over Class 1A West Marshall on Friday night. 
PCM, which is averaging nearly 43 points per game during its five-game win streak, led 21-0 after one quarter and 31-0 at halftime. 
Logan Gilman was 19-for-26 for 265 yards through the air, and he tossed four touchdown passes in the win. 
Gilman connected with Tyler Dredge and Luke Greiner for short touchdown passes in the first quarter, hit Noah Clark on a 12-yarder in the second quarter and then hooked up with Greiner for a 76-yard strike in the third frame. 
Greiner finished with six catches for 116 yards and two scores, while Logan Littrell rushed for 47 yards, including a first quarter touchdown run of 20 yards. 
Chase Wilkie made all five of his extra points and booted a 34-yard field goal in the second quarter. 
The Mustang defense had 10 sacks in the game, five of which came from Clayton Welch. 
Reid Jenkins had a team-high nine tackles, while Tyler Dredge had an interception and Austin Sneller recovered a fumble. 
PCM travels to Osceola on Friday for a 7:30 p.m. varsity game against winless Clarke. The Indians have lost 24 straight games dating back to the 2013 season opener. 
West Marshall 0-0-0-0—0 
PCM — Littrell 20-yd run (Wilkie kick) 
PCM — Dredge 1-yd pass from Gilman (Wilkie kick) 
PCM — Greiner 5-yd pass from Gilman (Wilkie kick) 
PCM — Wilkie 34-yd field goal 
PCM — Clark 12-yd pass from Gilman (Wilkie kick) 
PCM — Greiner 72-yd pass from Gilman (Wilkie kick)
